demolition

Class Explosion

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Explosion

  • public class Explosion
extends java.lang.Object
    Spawns a set of explosiontiles from the location that the bomb was placed, and ensures explosions only break 1 breakable wall max and do not penetrate solidwalls

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Explosion(int x, int y, Level level, processing.core.PApplet app) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAllExpTiles()
      Adds all of the explosiontiles in the explosion object to the level the explosion object was created in
      java.util.List<GameObject> getExplosionTiles() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Explosion

        public Explosion(int x,
                 int y,
                 Level level,
                 processing.core.PApplet app)
        Parameters:
        x - the x coord for the centre of the explosion (bomb x)
        y - the y coord for the centre of the explosion (bomb y)
        level - the level in which the explosion is to be placed
        app - the app instance that runs the entire game

    • Method Detail

      • getExplosionTiles

        public java.util.List<GameObject> getExplosionTiles()
        Returns:
        all the explosion tiles in the explosion object that have not been removed preliminarily from hitting a block

      • addAllExpTiles

        public void addAllExpTiles()
        Adds all of the explosiontiles in the explosion object to the level the explosion object was created in
